course.subject: LANG
course.name: Science Communication in English (Environmental Science)
course.description: The course focuses on developing students' ability to communicate environmental science knowledge to the general public through effective writing and speaking skills. In writing, students learn the specific skills to produce genres of both expository and persuasive nature, and reflect on how to explain environmental science concepts in an accessible manner without losing the scientific complexity. In speaking, students learn how to communicate environmental science notions and implications to nonexpert audiences using short videos and oral presentations with appropriate rhetorical and stylistic devices. For students on programs offered by the Department of Ocean Science.

reviews.author: 淺水健
reviews.title: 可以安心reg的eng lang course
reviews.comment_content:
內容同其他eng lang course 差唔多，都係上堂講下唔同skill 可以用喺assignment 上。依個course 強調如何將environmental science推廣比普通人知道

註: Elza 好似是course coordinator, 所以唔會似其他eng lang course 咁有A S I 班被嚴重拉分情況
reviews.comment_teaching: Elza 教得還可以，佢會同學生抽時間黎傾份assignment點做好，好有耐性。我有幾次交assignment 出了技術上問題佢都比我短時間內交返，通情達理的好tutor
reviews.comment_grading:
以eng lang course 而言好好grade
你肯努力完成所有tasks一定可以見成果，一大部份人B range
reviews.comment_workload:
workload 幾大，midterm 前交一份 500字文章同一段3分鐘video
final 要交 1000字essay 同5分鐘video 同你essay 有關(基本上essay 執少少已可以作video 的稿用)
